projects.title: 30 Day Walk Challenge
projects.goal: The goal is to build a habit of movement.

projects.title: 5 Day Movement Challenge
projects.how: For 5 days do 10 Squats and 10 Sit Ups
projects.goal: The goal is to mix it up and move!

projects.title: 14 Day Water Challenge
projects.how: For 14 days drink half of your body weight in ounces.
projects.goal: The goal here is to focus on being hydrated

projects.title: 2 Day Gym Challenge
projects.how: This challenge is to go to the gym two times this week.
projects.goal: The goal is to get out and expand movement to increase muscle.

projects.title: 3 Day Fitness Challenge
projects.how: This challenge is broken up into three days. Day 1: 20 Squats. Day 2: 20 Sit Ups. Day 3: 20 Burpees.
projects.goal: The goal is to have fun and challenge yourself!
